result.formatted_address: Hong Kong, Kwun Tong, Hing Yip St, 4號The Wave 3 樓
result.name: 米走雞Live

reviews.text: Good place for hotpot. The food come in big portions and the price was reasonable. The staffs were attentive, helpful and polite. Not to mention they have live music on Sunday nights.

Went dinner with friends. Food are good and environment is okay.
They got sufficient staff and respond very quickly to customers requests
We were a gang of 9 with kids and had hotpot. The ingredients were awesome and the soupbases were great. The staff were also very nice, will come again.

Hardcore spicy chicken hotpot, I had the 3 chilis, which was already very spicy, can't imagine the 5 chillis one.  I usually can eat very spicy but this was really hardcore.  But it tasted good and the chicken was of big portion for a half chicken (other restaurants usually have small pieces of chicken with very few portions).  So if you're only two people, don't order too many side dishes, two to three is already enough.

I've tried the cheese chicken hotpot on another occasion and it was also amazing.  But it fills you up quite quickly. Again, don't order too many side dishes.

There was also live music starting around 9pm.
Cheesy chicken pot is a must try. Also the only one of the chain to have live music.

result.vicinity: The Wave 3 樓, 4 Hing Yip Street, Kwun Tong

result.formatted_address: 香港觀塘興業街4號The Wave 3 樓
result.name: 米走雞Live

reviews.text: 驚喜的原來雞煲都有live，第一次聽住歌打邊爐

一直聽聞米走雞芝士雞煲出名，今日終於帶女朋友去試下。枱面好貼心咁寫名芝士雞煲的食法和推介的食材，和姐姐熱情的介紹，終於係花多眼亂的選項下揀了配料。
一坐下姐姐就送上醬料，可以自行調配，每位醬料費$14
芝士雞煲可以揀激量芝士碎而唔洗加錢，緊係即揀啦：）雞煲一打開好吸睛，好多芝士碎，熱既時候可以做到輕微拉絲。一吃湯底果然有濃厚芝士咸香。雞件很多，也很入味。混合芝士湯底。邪惡又很滋味。
配料就揀左響鈴，好似係自家製既，好多層，所以浸一浸，外淋內脆。不過比較飽肚。
仲有蜂巢豆腐，係吸湯之選，口感好特別。仲叫左大路既芝士腸同魚皮鮫，鍾意芝士既我地，仲叫左全份既芝心丸，內裡可以拉絲。
最後叫左個辛辣麵，辛辣麵彈牙好掛芝士汁，真係好滿足。
食物可以叫半份同全份，兩個人來食又可以試多d 款，好貼心。
現場有live show, 歌手聲線不錯。打邊爐來講，第一次有咁既氣氛。
Good place for hotpot. The food come in big portions and the price was reasonable. The staffs were attentive, helpful and polite. Not to mention they have live music on Sunday nights.
幾好幾好，聽吓歌打吓邊爐

Went dinner with friends. Food are good and environment is okay.
They got sufficient staff and respond very quickly to customers requests
